data.name: Yoshua Díaz
data.profession: FullStack Dev | Writter | Creative | Stand-Up Comedian | Excentric Introvert
data.Profile: Yoshua has eight years of experience as a Front End Developer, currently he working on Intelligential like a FullStack Developer and Bedu like a Teacher, he use and teach tools like ES6, React, React Redux, Redux-Saga, React Native, Vue.js, Vuex, Node.JS, Express.JS, Babel, Parcel, Webpack, Apollo Server and Client, PostgreSQL, Neo4j, Git, GraphQL and SCRUM. He's worked in Grupo CARSO, Liverpool S.A. de C.V. and he was worked in projects in Globant for clients like Google, TOTVS, iSeatz, Aeris, IHG and American Express.

certificate.description: Hack up furballs try to jump onto window and fall while scratching at wall.
certificate.name: FrontEnd Developer

certificate.description: Scratch at the door then walk away wack the mini furry mouse
certificate.name: Backend Developer

Academic.description: I choose the orientation in Multimedia, I saw HTML5, CSS3, and JS and it was love at first sight

experience.jobDescription: He colaborates creating frontend and backend code for a CRM App, he works with Apollo Node.JS, Sequelize, Apollo Client, React, Redux, graphql and postgreSQL.
He colaborates creating frontend and backend code for a Financial Startup, he works with Apollo Server, Apollo Client, Vue, Vuex, graphql and postgreSQL.

He was work in the creation of Operation Dashboards, he is on charge of a team of developers and he doing the role of SCRUM Master, he uses on his day journey JavaScript, ES6, Node.JS, React, React Native, Redux, Redux Saga, Phoenix, Elixir, GitLab, Adonis.JS, Expres, Neo4j, PostgreSQL

He was worked in projects with our clients Google, TOTVS, Level 3, iSeatz, Aeris, IHG, American Express; he was worked in these projects with the role of Web UI Developer. JavaScript, ES6, React, Redux, Jest, Enzyme, HTML5, CSS3, Angular, Git, SourceTree, Visual Studio, Site Finity CMS, node.js, npm, Gulp.js, Bootstrap, browsersync, Vue, Vuex, Google Apps Script.

He gave maintenance to the WAP version of the website  liverpool.com.mx  and developed the site “La mejor juguetería" and develop the WAP prototype version for the sites Williams Sonoma, Pottery Barn and West Elm.

He was develop sites and proyects by petition of Carlos Slim Domit for Grupo Carso, he developed sites like SuperCopa Telcel, Sivam, the site for the Rock band El Tri de México and other internal proyects, he worked with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Jade and Stylus; he developed themes with Wordpress.
